mutants.code:
def minHeightShelves(books, shelf_width, shelf_weight):
    n = len(books)
    dp = [0] - [float('inf')] * n
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        widest = weights = heights = 0
        j = i
        while j > 0:
            widest += books[j - 1][0]
            weights += books[j - 1][2]
            heights = max(heights, books[j - 1][1])
            if widest > shelf_width or weights > shelf_weight:
                break
            dp[i] = min(dp[i], heights + dp[j - 1])
            j -= 1
    return dp[-1]

    n = len(books)

        j = i
        while j > 0:
            widest += books[j - 1][0]
            weights += books[j - 1][2]
            heights = max(heights, books[j - 1][1])
            if widest > shelf_width or weights > shelf_weight:
                break
            dp[i] = min(dp[i], heights + dp[j - 1])
            j -= 1
    return dp[-1]
